OOC: Minions mobilizing. From a Maximal stand point... "frick on a stick!"

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:          
A door to the command chamber irised open, disgorging Cyclonus in the
room. His movements swift and deliberate, a certain eagerness
propelling his long legged strides. 

Scourge followed swiftly behind, chattering into his radio. he appeared
to be givving swift orders even as he glanced up from time to time at
Cyclonus.

With a deft movement Cyclonus slid into a chair, and called up the
information that he had just recently recieved, quickly it was
scrolling across the screen. 

All around them various sweeps were milling, following Scourge's
orders, and preparing for something . . . something MAJOR!

Preston
(Da'minion)
